entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
